text.p: Delphi Information Systems Inc on Friday said it completed a private placement providing gross proceeds of $5.6 million.
As part of the private placement, Delphi said it issued warrants that may provide additional capital to the company in the future.
Proceeds from the placement will be used in consolidating Delphi's operations, continuing to build product platforms and exploiting significant revenue opportunities, Delphi said.
The company said it is pleased with this placement and the recently signed $4.0 million line of credit.
"We are now achieving operational and financial stability and are poised to capitalize on the notable revenue opportunities at hand," said Yuval Almog, chairman of Delphi.
Delphi provides business information solutions to the property and casualty insurance industry.
